overview: Welcome to Enchanted Island, an island covered with a mysterious enchanted forest, which is home to every form of magical creature you could ever imagine - fairies, mischievous boy sprites, unicorns, sirens, ancient tree spirits, and magic wishing wells. Join Twinkle and friends in four magical adventures: The Golden Wand, A Robot and the Fairies, The Goose With the Golden Eggs, and Lady Unicorn.
title: Super 4: Enchanted Island Adventures
